name: Stephanie takes on the internet
body:
Hello, and welcome to ~~the middle of the film~~ Stephanie Spielman's homepage.
====================

### About Me
I am a 4th year PhD Candidate in [Claus Wilke's lab](wilke.openwetware.org/) through the [Ecology, Evolution, and Behavior graduate program](http://www.biosci.utexas.edu/graduate/eeb/) at UT Austin.
You can contact me at stephanie.spielman@gmail.com, and you can access my CV [here](./files/SJSpielman_CV.pdf) (updated 10/25/14).

### Github repositories for publications

1. [Repository](https://github.com/sjspielman/alignment_filtering) for [_Limited utility of residue masking in positive-selection inference_](http://mbe.oxfordjournals.org/content/31/9/2496)


### On-going projects

1. [pyvolve](https://github.com/sjspielman/pyvolve), a python platform for simulating sequences along a phylogeny
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
